name: LIDAR Point Cloud Data File
summary: Learn about .E57 files and view a list of programs that open them.
developer: ASTM E57 Committee on 3D Imaging Systems

content:
The structure of an E57 file is as shown in the following table.

File StructureHeaderBinary section (points)Binary section (points)……Binary section (image)XML section

E57 files can be used for rendering images of real-world objects, such as buildings, atmospheric entities (e.g., clouds), and geological surfaces. This can be useful in construction, surveying, engineering, and research.
NOTE: The E57 format uses a combination of binary and XML data.
